__package__.yml.rawContents:
service:
  auth: false
  base-path: ''
  endpoints:
    list:
      path: /list-with-step
      method: GET
      auth: false
      docs: ''
      pagination:
        offset: $request.pageNumber
        step: $request.limit
        results: $response.users
        has-next-page: $response.meta.hasMore
      source:
        openapi: ../openapi.yml
      display-name: List
      request:
        name: ListRequest
        query-parameters:
          pageNumber: optional<integer>
          limit: optional<integer>
      response:
        docs: Success
        type: UsersResponse
      examples:
        - response:
            body: {}
  source:
    openapi: ../openapi.yml
types:
  Meta:
    properties:
      hasMore: optional<boolean>
    source:
      openapi: ../openapi.yml
  UsersResponse:
    properties:
      meta: optional<Meta>
      users: optional<list<User>>
    source:
      openapi: ../openapi.yml
  User:
    properties:
      id:
        type: optional<string>
        validation:
          format: uuid
      name: optional<string>
      email: optional<string>
      age: optional<integer>
    source:
      openapi: ../openapi.yml

rootApiFile.rawContents:
name: api
error-discrimination:
  strategy: status-code
display-name: Test extension `x-fern-pagination`
